body.p:
Office of the Commissary General of Prisoners
Washington, D. C., June 21st, 1864.
Hon Thos E. Bramlette
Governor State of Ky
Frankfort. Ky
Sir.

I have the honor to acknowledge the receipt of the petition referred by you on the 17th of May/64 for the release of Henry C. Garth, a prisoner of War at Louisville, Ky and to inform you in reply, that the case was submitted to the Secretary of War, by whom it is not favorably considered at this time, but the prisoner will not be sent South for Exchange against his consent

I am Sir very respectfully
Your Ob't Servt
W. Hoffman
Col 3d Infty
Com'y General of Prisoners
